name: Draw Essence
description: Channel draconic energy to suck in the air around you, dealing 870 Magic Damage to nearby enemies and healing you for 150% of the damage caused.  After 2.5 seconds, you exhale fire, dealing 1742 Flame Damage to nearby enemies and restoring 10% of the ability's cost for each enemy hit as Magicka.
effectLines: Initial hit heals for more.  Final explosion refunds Magicka for each enemy struck.
coefDescription: Channel draconic energy to suck in the air around you, dealing $1 Magic Damage to nearby enemies and healing you for 150% of the damage caused.  After 2.5 seconds, you exhale fire, dealing $2 Flame Damage to nearby enemies and restoring 10% of the ability's cost for each enemy hit as Magicka.
